评论概述: It came vacuum sealed-please stop doing that!
评论详情: I love these hoodies. I have purchased 3 now but this one came vacuum sealed and was so difficult to get the wrinkles out I almost sent it back, but I'd already cut the tags off it. I spritzed it with water - that did nothing. I washed it - no change. I finally had to iron it on a very low setting for 15 minutes to get the wrinkles out. While I was wearing it this weekend I realized I still didn't get out all the wrinkles so back to the ironing board. And it was so tedious! Grrrrrr...I will never keep anything that is vacuum sealed again. Clothing should not be vacuum sealed. Doing that literally assures that the wrinkles will never come out.
